sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { TextField, Button } from '@material-ui/core';
import { FormDialog, QuestionDialog } from '../Shared/Dialog';

export class AddUserDialog extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.state = {
      inputs: {
        login: null,
        password: null,
        type: null
      },
      loginError: false,
      passwordError: false
    }
    this.setData(this.state)
  }

  checkObligatoryFields = () => {
    let error = false
    if(!this.state.login) {
      const state = this.state
      state.loginError = true
      this.setState(state)
      error = true
    }

    if(!this.state.password) {
      const state = this.state
      state.passwordError = true
      this.setState(state)
      error = true
    }

    return error
  }

  setLogin = (login) => {
    const state = this.state
    state.inputs.login = login
    this.setState(state)
    this.setData(state.inputs)
  }

  setPassword = (password) => {
    const state = this.state
    state.inputs.password = password
    this.setState(state)
    this.setData(state.inputs)
  }

  setType = (event) => {
    const state = this.state
    state.inputs.type = event.target.value
    this.setState(state)
    this.setData(state.inputs)
  }

  setData = (data) => {
    this.props.setData(data)
  }

  render = () => {
    return (
    <FormDialog isOpen={this.props.isOpen} onClose={(type) => {if(type === 'done' && this.checkObligatoryFields()) this.props.onClose()}} title={this.props.title}>
      <TextField
      autoFocus
      required
      error={this.state.loginError}
      margin="dense"
      id="login"
      label="Login"
      type="text"
      fullWidth
      onChange={(event) => {
        if(this.state.loginError && event.target.value) {
          let state = this.state
          state.loginError = false
          this.setState(state)
        }
        this.setLogin(event.target.value)}}
      />

      <TextField
      autoFocus
      required
      error={this.state.passwordError}
      margin="dense"
      id="password"
      label="Password"
      type="password"
      fullWidth
      onChange={(event) => {
        if(this.state.passwordError && event.target.value) {
          let state = this.state
          state.passwordError = false
          this.setState(state)
        }
        this.setPassword(event.target.value)}}
      />

      <select name="Type" onChange={this.setType}>
      <option value="Empty" selected>Empty</option>
      {this.props.types.map(type => <option value={type}>{type}</option>)}
      </select>
    </FormDialog>
  )}
}

export const EditUserDialog = (props) =>
    <FormDialog isOpen={props.isOpen} onClose={props.onClose} title={props.title}>
      <TextField
            autoFocus
            required
            margin="dense"
            id="login"
            label="Login"
            type="text"
            fullWidth
          />

        <TextField
            autoFocus
            margin="dense"
            id="password"
            label="Password"
            type="password"
            fullWidth
          />

        <TextField
            autoFocus
            margin="dense"
            id="type"
            label="Type"
            type="password"
            fullWidth
          />
    </FormDialog>

export const DeleteUserDialog = (props) =>
    <QuestionDialog isOpen={props.isOpen} title={props.title}>
      <Button onClick={() => {props.onClose('cancel')}} color="primary">
        Cancel 
      </Button>
      <Button onClick={() => {props.onClose('delete')}} color="primary">
        Delete 
      </Button>
    </QuestionDialog>
